com.yantra.ycp.passwordpolicy.dom

Interface IPasswordPolicyForPasswordChange

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPasswordPolicy

    public interface IPasswordPolicyForPasswordChange
extends IPasswordPolicy
    This interface provides methods to validate password.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document onPasswordChange(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document user)
      This method is invoked when password changes.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.yantra.ycp.passwordpolicy.dom.IPasswordPolicy

        setParams

    • Method Detail

      • onPasswordChange

        org.w3c.dom.Document onPasswordChange(YFSEnvironment env,
                                      org.w3c.dom.Document user)
        This method is invoked when password changes. env Environment handle user Document based user attributes. Document specifying the result of the method. The document should necessarily be in format <PasswordPolicyResult Result="SUCCESS|FAILURE|REQUIRE_PASSWORD_CHANGE" DaysUntilExpiration="(number)" ErrorCode="(used if failure)"/>
